column4: Hello, I installed Ubuntu intrepid 32 bits from new, and all the VPN pptp pakets in order to establish a VPN connection to my work place, well it is still not working, HELP
So, If #ubuntu doesn't help,. #ubuntu-bugs either, and this is clearly a PROBLEM with the distribution,What it is supossed to us to do ????? Go back to XP or what?
I have been asking this question in this channel and #ubuntu-bugs for weeks
this is not my first day
and this is a BUG with Intrepid
that hasn't been solved yet
do you have the launchpad bug number?
is there an open bug report on this?
just put in luanchpad "intrepid vpn" and you will see
please link the specific bug
lose the caps
dont need to extract them usually, just drop on theme manager; alternately you can read the instructions where you got them
droping them I get an invalid theme error, and I tried so far 15
these are 3rd party themes, and not all of them work. Use at your own discretion
complaining wont get you quicker help.
complaining where? I just said I tried so far 15 diferents packets from ubuntu-themes.org and neither of them worked; SO it seems I got a probeme here
honey catches more flies than vinegar
what???
we are volunteers. no need for the ???? multiple question marks and exclamation points.
many themes are poorly written and you need to follow the instructions where they come from
more than 15, likely 150 are not well written.
